publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2063 Mr Adam Ingram: SIGN Guidelines on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder—That the Parliament welcomes the long-awaited guidelines produced by the Scottish Intercollegiate Guidelines Network on attention deficit hyperactivity disorder; further acknowledges the request that non-pharmacological support is provided to complement drug therapy; notes the current financial constraints on local authorities, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make a commitment to resource the needs expressed in the guidelines.
S1M-2063 SIGN Guidelines on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (lodged on 4 July 2001) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2063 SIGN Guidelines on Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (lodged on 4 July 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Linda Fabiani*, Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
